name: Barking Tuna Web Design
tagline: Phoenix Small Business Website Design Firm
description:
Barking Tuna is a Small Business Website Design Firm in Phoenix, AZ specializing in Self Storage Facility Websites, Small to Medium-sized websites, eCommerce websites, Local SEO, and other Web Design needs at an affordable rate.
All of the websites we produce are custom tailored to your brand and branding message and employ industry best practices.
We strive to develop websites using proper SEO techniques, intelligent and effective copywriting, that are visually appealing and easy to use.
